channel.title: CVE Feed for Phoenix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Phoenix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5058|2024-08-02T07:44:53.613Z -- phoenix -- securecore%E2%84%A2%20technology%E2%84%A2%204
item.description: Improper Input Validation in the processing of user-supplied splash screen during system boot in Phoenix SecureCore™ Technology™ 4 potentially allows denial-of-service attacks or arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-0762|2024-08-01T18:18:17.893Z -- phoenix -- securecore%E2%84%A2%20for%20intel%20kaby%20lake
CVE-2024-1598|2024-08-01T18:48:21.686Z -- phoenix -- securecore%E2%84%A2%20for%20intel%20gemini%20lake
item.description:
Potential buffer overflow in unsafe UEFI variable handling
in Phoenix SecureCore™ for Intel Gemini Lake.This issue affects:
SecureCore™ for Intel Gemini Lake: from 4.1.0.1 before 4.1.0.567.

item.title: CVE-2023-35841|2024-06-04T17:18:27.432Z -- phoenix -- winflash%20driver
item.description: Exposed IOCTL with Insufficient Access Control in Phoenix WinFlash Driver on Windows allows Privilege Escalation which allows for modification of system firmware.This issue affects WinFlash Driver: before 4.5.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-1598|2024-06-04T18:01:14.870Z -- phoenix -- securecore%E2%84%A2%20for%20intel%20gemini%20lake
item.description:
Potential buffer overflow in unsafe UEFI variable handling
in Phoenix SecureCore™ for Intel Gemini Lake.This issue affects:
SecureCore™ for Intel Gemini Lake: from 4.1.0.1 before 4.1.0.567.
